name: Oyster Odyssey (Zombie_Dude)
description:
The oysters need our help and you're the only one who could save them! Begin your aquanaut adventures, and find the 5 oysters that are lost in the depths of the ocean, can you find them?
Discover all 5 secret locations of the oysters in this immersive  exploration game, and don't get hit by the crabs, 3 cuts in your suit and it’s game over. 

Made for the Seidenberg Hackathon December 2020 in collaboration with The Billion Oyster Project
